channel.title: Dicing pleas help

item.title: Dicing pleas help
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:36, topic:527500”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=646253.msg4346987#msg4346987 date=1376028022]

if(command.startsWith("dice") && donator >= 1){ setAnimation(3141); plrText = "I just rolled "+misc.random(100)+" with my dice"; plrTextUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; }

just change the command to the dice item and place it with your other items and alter the code to fit your server since this a delta format and plus add the right animation for dicing…not gonna lie but after finding out “misc.random(100)” help me create a gambling system and a working ring of wealth
[/quote]Wowzers cool!! :eek:[/quote] no need Null Ammount Fixd it for me and i love him for that rly and as said @Null Amount Sory for all i did

Read full topic

just change the command to the dice item and place it with your other items and alter the code to fit your server since this a delta format and plus add the right animation for dicing…not gonna lie but after finding out “misc.random(100)” help me create a gambling system and a working ring of wealth

item.title: Dicing pleas help
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:33, topic:527500”]if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) { //Dice Bag ID } if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) { int roll = Misc.random(99)+1; if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this item."); return; } if(c.inAclan == false) { c.sendMessage("You must be in a clan to use this item."); return; }Now you have the clan check. [b]MAKE SURE YOU HAVE IMPORTS SET CORRECTLY.[/quote]ooooooohhh now i see what i did wrong i didnt put the false thingy beond the inAclan thx bra want to rep++ but can

FUCK YEAAAHAA JIZZD IN MA PANTS BRA THX AND SORRY FOR EVERYTHING I SAID TO U ! <3

item.title: Dicing pleas help

item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) { //Dice Bag ID } if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) { int roll = Misc.random(99)+1; if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this item."); return; } if(c.inAclan == false) { c.sendMessage("You must be in a clan to use this item."); return; }Now you have the clan check. [b]MAKE SURE YOU HAVE IMPORTS SET CORRECTLY.

@The7thSanctum wrote:

Oh my. This is the first time I’ve seen someone fuck up using c.sendMessage…

Replace your:

With:

Also, with the !c.inAClan(), you’ll need to check your own source for a fix to that. Not all sources are the same when it comes to handling clan’s.

item.title: Dicing pleas help
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:12, topic:527500”][quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=646253.msg4346237#msg4346237 date=1375917274]

[quote author=Null Amount link=topic=646253.msg4346170#msg4346170 date=1375911465]

[quote author=mgl link=topic=646253.msg4346162#msg4346162 date=1375910502]
to fix those errors, change:

to -

And I am not really sure what plrText is, but I think I’d just use c.sendMessage in that case…
[/quote]That wouldn’t fix the error. It can’t find the method, the error isn’t being caused because they didn’t invert the value of that method. Make sure that your imports are correct and that your casing is correct for the method.
[/quote]now we got 2 errors:

[code]if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) { //Dice Bag ID
}
if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) {
int roll = Misc.random(100)+1;
if(c.playerRights == 0) {
c.sendMessage(“You must be a donator to use this item.”);
return;
}
if(!c.inAclan()) {
c.sendMessage(“You must be in a clan to use this item.”);
return;
}
c.sendMessage = “You roll a “+roll+”!”;
Server.clanChat.playerMessageToClan(c.playerId, "[DICE YELL] I Have Rolled A “+ roll +” On The Percentile Dice ", c.clanId);
c.startAnimation(11900);
c.gfx0(2075);
c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if(itemId == 15262) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(15262, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(18016, 15000);
} // SUMMON SHARDS
if (itemId == 15084){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(106, 4289);
}

			if(itemId == 11949) {
	c.makesnow();
	c.stopMovement();
	}[/code]


[/quote]For your first error.[quote]Make sure that your imports are correct and that your casing is correct for the method.[/quote] For your second, change it to c.sendMessage("You roll a " + roll + “!”);[/quote]now it is this

if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) { //Dice Bag ID } if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) { int roll = Misc.random(100)+1; if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this item."); return; } if(!c.inAclan()) { c.sendMessage("You must be in a clan to use this item."); return; }

Read full topic
